mapper.insert: insert into user_relation (id, userid1, userid2, remark, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select id, userid1, userid2, remark, type from user_relation
